website_summaries.verdict: Don't discount this TV just because it's not large, as its audio and video prove that good things come in small packages.
pros: Decent picture quality for a very affordable price
40-inch screen size isn't large enough for everyone, but is perfect for small rooms and limited spaces
Notable motion rate and "game mode' make it suitable for gamers
Surprisingly good sound for the size and price
cons: Not 4K and doesn't have smart capabilities, but considering the feature set and low price you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Good Price But Lacks Alot
customer_reviews.text: The TV, for the price, is good, but you’re definitely sacrificing a lot. 1. Color - it looks opaque, lacking vibrance. 2. Resolution - my 2014 720P Samsung (32 in) looks better. The dimensions are perfect for a bedroom or a small living room. The sound is the only thing going for the unit. The unit is light. Easy to pick up. It doesn't require more than one person to set up. Ultimately, if you're not big on color, then this TV is..... Ok. It's a low end budget TV - like buying cheap razors; you regret it, but you bought a years supply from a big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Audio Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: After My Samsung 32 inch flat screen TV/Monitor died, I ordered the Komodo Sceptre 43" 4K on July 22, 2018. The audio was such a disaster that I have to return it on August 8, 2018 . I ordered the Hisense 40H3080E 40-Inch 1080p LED TV (2018 Model) the same day. The audio was much better. It was designed to have external speaker connectivity that stays connected (It doesn't reset to manufacturer setting every time it turns off). It connected nicely to my Logitech speakers with surround sound capability. The picture looks sharp with the 1080 dpi movies. The TV is also compatible with Spectrum remote set up. I can use Spectrum remote to adjust the volume.

customer_reviews.title: 4K HDTV value
customer_reviews.text: This is used in a bedroom.It replaced a LG.The decision was based on features for the value,especially since we only wanted the 40" size.ARC was a must have,and it works with a supported 4K hdmi cable.WiFi works well,the pictures are from Youtube. Resolution,color,you need to go into the settings to adjust.Watching center, or in front is the best because the side angle can look washed out ,yet the color remains decent.For those who may want a timer,it's under "time." So far,every feature is working ,and we're satisfied with the economically priced HDTV. It is mounted with a fully articulating Simbr via Amazon.

product_meta.title: Hisense 40H3080E 40-Inch 1080p LED TV (2018 Model)
product_meta.description: The H3 Series LED HDTV has Motion rate, game Mode, audio return channel, and a USB media player. This must-have TV is available in sizes that are ideal for smaller rooms-and budgets.
feature_bullets: 40-inch class screens are ideal for guest bedrooms, home gyms, college dorms and other smaller spaces
Full High Definition 1080p resolution shows a sharper and detailed picture than HD 720p
Motion Rate technology minimizes delays during fast-moving scenes
Fast-paced video games can be processed in less than 35 milliseconds to reduce input lag and color inaccuracies
HDMI Audio Return Channel (ARC) support eliminates having to use multiple cables to send audio from your TV to a soundbar
HDMI Consumer Electronics Control (CEC) support allows for your external AV devices to talk to and control one another
2 HDMI inputs and 1 USB are available to connect external devices
